tool_description: Decode the 12 digit HIN and check if it is valid. HINDecoder is used by many State DMV's and has been running for 7+ years.

api_list.name: Year & Make Lookup (returns json)
api_list.description: Lookup the boat manufacturers (makes) for a given year. This API can be used to create selection drop down menu for year and make. It will return json results

required_parameters.name: year
required_parameters.description: The year you want to look for the boat builders. format YYYY.  From 1970 to present year.
